channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Sen. Rand Paul does not want Vice President J.D. Vance to be the next president
item.description: Sen. Rand Paul said Sunday that he's not on board with efforts to name Vice President J.D. Vance as the heir apparent to President Trump.

item.title: Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche says 'There is nothing' Trump is hiding in Epstein files

item.title: Little Women’s Unsung Heroine
item.description: The oft-overlooked Marmee steadies and guides.

item.title: What the Founders Understood About Faith and Freedom
item.description: Faith is not an intruder in public life; it’s a part of our civic DNA.

item.title: Coast Guard is pursuing another tanker helping Venezuela skirt sanctions, U.S. official says
item.description: The U.S. Coast Guard on Sunday was pursuing another sanctioned oil tanker in the Caribbean Sea as the Trump administration appeared to be intensifying...

item.title: Republicans Still Crave the Mainstream Media’s Affection
item.description: What else are we to infer from the Vanity Fair episode?

item.title: The Right’s Simmering Tensions over Abortion
item.description: Donald Trump’s political advisers don’t want to talk about abortion, but pro-lifers need to speak up.

item.title: America’s Risky Retreat in Biomedical Leadership
item.description: The CDC’s plan to end primate research will weaken our biomedical capabilities just as our global competitors are shoring up theirs.

item.title: Reps. Thomas Massie, Ro Khanna want to fine AG Pam Bondi until she releases all Epstein files
item.description: Reps. Thomas Massie and Ro Khanna said they are drafting an "inherent contempt" measure that would fine Attorney General Pam Bondi until she complies.

item.title: Chaplains Punished For Mentioning Jesus Cheer Hegseth’s Return To God-Focused Ministry
item.description: The chaplain brings God to the fight, offering something bigger for the soldier to hold on to. It is something an atheist can't offer.

item.title: Yes, Trump Pardoned 70-Year-Old Colorado Election Clerk, Gov. Polis Should Too
item.description: As Christians celebrate the birth of Jesus, Tina Peters' supporters call on Gov. Polis to reflect that spirit.
